ai-kv15.4:1.1_0: the moment, instant, the instant, the surface of the water.
ai-kv15.4:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv15.4:1.9_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv15.4:2.5_0: “There are, mendicants, these three topics of discussion.
ai-kv15.4:2.8_0: ‘That is how it was in the past.’
ai-kv15.4:2.10_0: ‘That’s how it will be in the future.’
ai-kv15.4:2.11_0: Or you might discuss the present:
ai-kv15.4:2.12_0: ‘This is how it is at present.’
ai-kv15.4:2.13_0: These are the three topics of discussion.”
ai-kv15.4:2.16_0: for that is why a free Friends dried up
ai-kv15.4:2.17_0: The discussion of the momentary chariot is finished.
